options.name: Action [Daily] : Designitate Companion
options.description: You Choose an Ally with 10 Units and designate them as your Companion until a new one is picked using this Action again. When you or your Companion makes a Lifeline Check within 10 Units of each other, gain a 1d4 Bonus.

options.name: Helpful
options.description: Skill Checks that you Assist your Companion on do not suffer a Negative Modifier when failing and successful use of an Assisted Check adds a +3 Bonus Modifier instead of +2.

options.name: Confidence in Allies
options.description: Your Companion gains a 1d4 Bonus to all Resistance Checks while within 15 Units of you.

options.name: Action : Coordinate
options.description: If your Companion is within 20 Units, you move their Initiative Order to yours. This can only be used once per Engagement.

options.name: Free Action : Coordinated Assault
options.description: Your Companion gains an extra 1d4 Attack Bonus to their next Weapon Attack.

options.name: Reaction : Motivate
options.description: Your Companion immediately takes an Action.
